summary: REQ-5 is only partially evidenced by the diff summary: `siteConfig.ts` appears to have been expanded and (per `frontend-file-summaries.txt`) its `media.images` was updated, but the diff does not show any changes to `DemoMediaSection.tsx` and does not explicitly show the image file being added (the diff reports 0 added files). The diff also includes unrelated configuration/metadata changes not requested by REQ-5.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded image file to the repo under a stable public path (e.g., `frontend/public/assets/`) with a reasonable, URL-safe filename.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary reports "Added: 0" and lists no added files, so the addition of the actual JPEG cannot be confirmed from the diff itself (even though `frontend-file-summaries.txt` mentions an asset path).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions `frontend/public/assets/whatsapp-image-2026-02-06-092349.jpeg`, but this is not corroborated by an added-file entry)

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the Demo & Media section renders the image in the existing image grid and no longer shows the "Demo content coming soon" placeholder when the image is present (via `frontend/src/components/sections/DemoMediaSection.tsx`).
missing_requirements.reason: `frontend/src/components/sections/DemoMediaSection.tsx` is not listed among modified files, so there is no evidence in the diff summary that placeholder logic/rendering behavior was updated.
evidence: MODIFIED FILES list does not include `frontend/src/components/sections/DemoMediaSection.tsx`

hallucinated_features.description: Large expansion of `frontend/src/siteConfig.ts` with new domain content and types (e.g., `Application`, `HysteresisNote`, practical applications list), beyond simply adding a media image URL.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5 only asks to add a static image asset and update `siteConfig.media.images` to include its URL; the diff shows extensive unrelated config/type additions and content changes.
evidence: frontend/src/siteConfig.ts (adds `Application`, `HysteresisNote`, expands `SiteConfig` and adds extensive new config content; truncated)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (describes structured data for practical applications and hysteresis note in `siteConfig.ts`)

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state update unrelated to adding a demo/media image.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5 does not request changes to project state tracking files.

hallucinated_features.description: Update to `frontend-file-summaries.txt` describing multiple features/sections unrelated to REQ-5.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5 does not request maintaining or changing summary/manifest files; the update appears broader than the requested image addition.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (modified; includes many unrelated section descriptions)
